page.title: 01Collingbourne Kingston
page.content: Downs to North West of Collingbourne Kingston. The block covers an area of undullating down land which is now farmed extensively. It is an area of outstanding naural beauty and wilk life abounds among the verges to the fields and in the small areas of woodland. The small hmlet of Creighton is situated in the S.E. corner of the block. It comprises a few old thatched cottages and much large group of council houses. There is little work in the locality apart from that on the farms and even there jobs ae few due to extensive use of modern machinery.
